location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Index to the Diaries of Sir Arthur Hirtzel

physicalDescription.extent: Entries in the volume are arranged in alphabetical order.The volume is an index to the diaries of Sir Arthur Hirtzel for the years 1906, 1907 and 1908 [Mss Eur D1090/1 to Mss Eur D1090/3].

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 96; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This volume is an index to the diaries of Sir Arthur Hirtzel for the years 1906, 1907 and 1908. The volume is divided into sections for each letter of the alphabet. For each letter, places, subjects, and persons (mostly their surnames), beginning with that letter and mentioned in the diaries, are listed, together with the year, day and month of the relevant diary entries.
